# serval_access_request (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_access_request" "example_access_request" {
  id = "id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the access request.

### Read-Only

- `access_minutes` (Number) The number of minutes of access requested.
- `business_justification` (String) The business justification provided for the request.
- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the access request was created.
- `expires_at` (String) The timestamp when the access expires (if approved and active).
- `linked_ticket_id` (String) The ID of the linked ticket, if any.
- `requested_by_user_id` (String) The ID of the user who requested access.
- `requested_role_id` (String) The ID of the requested role.
- `status` (String) The status of the access request.
Available values: "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_PENDING", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_APPROVED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_DENIED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_EXPIRED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_REVOKED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_CANCELED", "ACCESS_REQUEST_STATUS_FAILED".
- `target_user_id` (String) The ID of the target user for whom access was requested.
- `team_id` (String) The ID of the team that the access request belongs to.
